entities.name: metal tub
entities.description: The metal tub is described as being in the sink, full of dirty rags and grey water.

entities.name: grey water
entities.description: The grey water is described as swimming in the metal tub.

entities.name: dirty rags
entities.description: The dirty rags are described as looking like they are swimming in the grey water.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as being present and responding to Harry's question.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who asks questions and expresses his doubts about his new uniform.

entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as having old things that are being dyed grey for Harry's school uniform.

entities.name: Stonewall High
entities.description: Stonewall High is mentioned as the new school that Harry will be attending.

entities.name: Smeltings stick
entities.description: The Smeltings stick is described as being carried by Dudley everywhere.

entities.name: newspaper
entities.description: Uncle Vernon's newspaper is mentioned as something he opens and reads.

relationships.description: Harry asks Aunt Petunia a question about the metal tub.
Aunt Petunia responds to Harry's question by saying it is his new school uniform.
